nodes.text: The Gold Crescent was an award given out by the Galactic Republic for serving with merit during the Galactic War. After the capture of General Arkos Rakton during the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY the commander of Havoc Squad was awarded the Cross of Glory, while the rest of the squadmembers each received a Gold Crescent.
Gold Crescent is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Trooper class mission on Coruscant.
